Data class tests¶

## Setup

Setup¶

[ ]:

__author__    = 'Steve Nicholes'
__copyright__ = 'Copyright (C) 2017 Steve Nicholes'
__license__   = 'GPL v3'
__version__   = '0.1.0'



# Imports
%load_ext autoreload
%autoreload 2
import sys
sys.path = [r'C:\GitHub\fivecentplots'] + sys.path
import fivecentplots as fcp
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import os, sys, pdb
%matplotlib inline
import matplotlib.pyplot as mpl

osjoin = os.path.join
db = pdb.set_trace

Read sample data¶



df_raw = pd.read_csv(r'C:\GitHub\fivecentplots\fivecentplots\tests\fake_data.csv')
df_raw.head()
Substrate Target Wavelength Boost Level Temperature [C] Die Voltage I Base I [A]
0 Si 450 0.2 25 (1,1) 0.0 0 0
1 Si 450 0.2 25 (1,1) 0.1 0 0
2 Si 450 0.2 25 (1,1) 0.2 0 0
3 Si 450 0.2 25 (1,1) 0.3 0 0
4 Si 450 0.2 25 (1,1) 0.4 0 0

Init class¶



df = fcp.Data(df=df_raw, x='Voltage', y='I [A]', fig_items=['InP', 'Si'], fig_groups=['Substrate'],
              row='Boost Level', col='Temperature [C]')

get_df_figure iterator¶



for i, fig_val, df_fig in df.get_df_figure():
    print(df_fig.head())

get_rc_subset iterator¶



for ir, ic, df_sub in df.get_rc_subset(df_fig):
    print(ir, ic, df_sub.head())
